findings.title: Rounding errors in PositionManagerInternal.sol
findings.description: Incorrect rounding direction mistakes in accounting functions can lead to user funds drainage.

findings.title: AAVE pool address changes are not handled
findings.description: Morpho only obtains the AAVE pool address once during deployment and does not reflect subsequent changes.

findings.title: Risk of infinite approvals
findings.description: Infinite approvals lead to security risks, including draining assets and creating markets for tokens with balance checks.

findings.title: Morpho can end-up in AAVEâ€™s isolation mode
findings.description: An attacker can put Morpho into isolation mode by manipulating debt ceilings and reserves.

findings.title: Potential deadlock when disabling reserves as collateral
findings.description: Deadlock can occur when marking reserves as non-collateral on Morpho and AAVE.

findings.title: Reentrancy in Morpho.claimRewards
findings.description: An attacker might be able to reorder the RewardsClaimed events.
